message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I believe will be very valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $10,000.  What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $10,000 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000. What do you think?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm hoping to get a bit closer to $10,000.  Would you be willing to pay $9,500? This would still be a great deal for you, and it would allow me to get closer to my target price.
